retailer.title: Reseller Management
retailer.subtitle: View cashback and withdrawals
retailer.description: You are a reseller, you can earn cashback from paid orders of invited users
retailer.rulesShortDescription: Learn how to earn cashback rewards
retailer.inviteCodeHint: Share this invite code or link to invite friends to register and purchase membership to earn cashback rewards
retailer.becomeRetailerTitle: Become a Reseller, Earn Promotional Income
retailer.becomeRetailerDesc: Earn cashback commission when invited users make payments, easily achieve passive income

retailerStats.title: Reseller Achievements
retailerStats.subtitle: View your promotional earnings
retailerStats.usersNeeded: {{count}} more paid users needed to upgrade
retailerStats.contentProofNeeded: Content creation proof required for upgrade

retailerRule.freezePeriod: Freeze Period: Cashback must be frozen for 30 days after arrival before withdrawal (to prevent refund risk)
retailerRule.settlementCycle: Settlement Cycle: Cashback arrives in wallet in real-time, automatically converts to withdrawable balance after freeze period
retailerRule.refundDeduction: Refund Processing: If user requests refund, corresponding cashback amount will be deducted from your wallet
retailerRule.withdrawalFee: Withdrawal fee: Borne by reseller (specific fees depend on payment channel, generally 3-5% of withdrawal amount)
retailerRule.withdrawalTime: Processing time: Withdrawal requests will be processed within 14 days
retailerRule.withdrawalAccount: Withdrawal account: Must first add and verify payment address in 'Wallet Management'
retailerRule.ruleModification: Platform reserves the right to modify reseller rules at any time, modified rules take effect immediately upon announcement
retailerRule.disputeResolution: If you have any questions or disputes about reseller rules, please contact customer support promptly
retailerRule.finalInterpretation: Platform reserves final interpretation rights for these rules
retailerRule.agreement: Continued use of reseller features indicates you have read and agree to all the above terms.
